verses.text: If you argue your case with a neighbor, do not betray another man's confidence,

rsbNotes.title: Pr 25:9
rsbNotes.text: 25:9 do not reveal anotherâ€™s secret. Do not involve others in a dispute.

verses.text: or he who hears it may shame you and you will never lose your bad reputation.

rsbNotes.title: Pr 25:10
rsbNotes.text: 25:10 your ill repute have no end. Betrayal of confidences will lead to a reputation for disloyalty.
